name: Fireside Merge and Craft Pizza
description:
Run your own pizza shop in this fast-paced merge and craft cooking game. Craft your pizza by merging ingredients, adding toppings, and baking it to perfection and then deliver it to a hungry customer. As you level-up, you’ll unlock new and more complicated pizza recipes.

Game highlights:

• Purchase pre-merged items from the shop to save time
• Hungry customers need to be fed quickly
• Delicious toppings include mushrooms, olives, and pepperoni

More varieties of toppings and pizza to come soon!
